clinical_study.brief_title: Tedizolid Suppressive Antimicrobial Therapy in a Reference Center

brief_summary.textblock: the aim of the study is to describe the management and outcome of patients having an osteo-articular infection treated by tedizolid as a suppressive antibiotic therapy.
